title: MITRF
description: This is a website project from Mapua University for my OJT, made from Laravel PHP Framework. A loaning app website for Mapua employees that consists of a User and Admin login system.

title: Online Grocery Shopping System
description: Trying to test my skills in my web programming knowledge, I made a personal project called Cart-To-Go. Cart-To-Go is a web based online grocery store where the users browse supplies and users could order and ship chosen products. This also has an admin system where the admin can add, delete, and update product records like quantity, availability, prices, etc.

title: LMS Website
description: This is a localhost website based on a learning management system (LMS). It serves as a small group project in my university.
